function.name: fetch_web_page
function.description: Fetches and returns the content of a web page.

url.description: The URL of the web page to fetch.

name: search_google
description: Simulates a simple Google search and returns the first result URL.

query.description: The search query to look up on Google.

function.name: get_all_stop_times
function.description: Obtains all stop times of buses/metro for a given public transport station in Dubai. If an error is encountered, simply report the error itself.

stop_name.description: The name of the public transport station
